title: Organization

schema:numberOfEmployees.description: The number of employees the at the organization.
schema:numberOfEmployees.title: Number of employees

xdm:marketSegment.description: The named market segment that the organization participates in. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:identifier` property.
xdm:marketSegment.title: Market segment

xdm:rating.description: The calculated score or star rating for this organization. `1` indicates the maximum possible rating, `0` the minimum possible rating.
xdm:rating.title: Rating

xdm:industry.description: The industry that this organization is a part of. This is a free-form field, and it is advisable to use a structured value for queries or to use the `xdm:classifier` property.
xdm:industry.title: Industry

xdm:identifier.description: This object contains unambiguous identifiers for the organization. Each key is the URI of an identification service, each value is the unique ID or preferably URI of the organization as defined by the identification service.
xdm:identifier.title: Organization identifier

xdm:website.description: The URL of the organization's website.
xdm:website.title: Website URL

xdm:classifier.description: This object contains unambiguous classifiers for the organization. Each key is the URI of an classification service or standard, each value is the unique ID or preferably URI of the organization as defined by the classification service.
xdm:classifier.title: Market or industry classifier

@id.description: A unique identifier for the organization.
@id.title: Organization ID

xdm:legalName.description: The official or legal name of the organization.
xdm:legalName.title: Organization legal name

xdm:annualRevenue.description: Estimated amount of annual revenue of the organization.
xdm:annualRevenue.title: Annual Revenue

xdm:location.description: The location of the organization's main office or headquarters.
xdm:location.title: Location
